member.summary: Use to force the linear gauge to finish any deferred work before printing or evaluating its visual.
member.remarks: This should only be called if the visual of the linear gauge needs to be synchronously saved or evaluated. Calling this method too often will hinder the performance of the linear gauge.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.XamRadialGauge.ScaleValue(System.Double)

member.name: M:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.XamRadialGauge.UnscaleValue(System.Double)
member.summary: Unscales a value from an angle in radians to the represented value along the main scale of the gauge.
member.param: The angle in radians to unscale to a value.
member.returns: The unscaled value on the gauge's main scale.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Controls.Gauges.XamRadialGauge.GetValueForPoint(System.Windows.Point)
member.summary: Gets the value for the main scale of the gauge for a given point within the bounds of the gauge.
member.param: The point for which to retrieve the associated value.
member.returns: The value on the gauge equating to the desired point.

member.returns: Point that corresponds to a given value and extent.
